Name: Stephen
description:
Stephen is an organic and Fair Trade certified oil palm farmer who lives in Akim-Abaam, which is in the Kwaebibirem District of the eastern region of Ghana, West Africa. He is 57 years old, divorced, and has seven children. Three of his children are pursuing their senior high school education and the others have a basic education.

Stephen believe organic oil palm is profitable and helps to protect the environment. For this reason, he wants to secure a Kiva microloan so that he can expand his oil palm fields.
